about_the_game:
Bang Bang Pull Pull is the most literal on-rail shooter of them all!
In the game, you do bang bang to anything that moves and pull everything of value, all while riding a fast-moving mining cart through various handcrafted levels.



Let us introduce you to a Gun, your first new friend who will accompany you on this wild journey. Forget about magazine size and reloads. Who has time for that? Just shoot and then shoot more!



Lasso will be your right-hand man. There’s no time to stop and loot. Just grab and pull everything you want while riding through the level at top speed!



Explore different routes, discover secrets, and have fun. The ride is short, fast, packed, and lean. Easy to grab, easy to try, and always just a button press away from another run!

Enjoy handcrafted and tightly intertwined levels with over-the-top themes and badass music to accompany you on your wacky adventures and crazy stunts.

name: Bang Bang Pull Pull

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750, 2.66 GHz | AMD Phenom II X3 720, 2.8 GHz (w/ at least 3-threads)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, 3.1 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 4.3 GHz (w/ at least 3-threads)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB

short_description: Ride a mining cart to the depths of the Earth in this fast-paced FPS adventure. Grab what’s not glued, shoot everything that moves, explore different paths, and aim for the best run in these handcrafted levels.
